name: Regenerative Organ
description: An organ harvested from a creature with natural regenerative abilities. Enhances the body's ability to heal over time.
properties: Standard: No benefit. Champion: Grants +1 health recovery per full rest. Elite: Grants +2 health recovery per full rest.

name: Venomous Organ
description: A venom gland harvested from a venomous creature. Allows the host to produce and inject toxic venom through bite attacks.
properties: Standard: No benefit. Champion: Once per day, when you bite a creature, you can inject venom. The target must make an endurance check of 7 or become poisoned for 1 minute, taking 3 toxic damage at the start of each of their turns. Elite: Once per day, when you bite a creature, you can inject venom. The target must make an endurance check of 7 or become poisoned for 1 minute, taking 5 toxic damage at the start of each of their turns.

name: Adrenal Gland
description: An enhanced adrenal gland harvested from a creature with exceptional energy production. Improves the body's ability to generate energy.
properties: Standard: No benefit. Champion: Grants +1 energy recovery per round. Elite: Grants +1 energy recovery per round and +1 max energy.
